record.title: ORDER OF BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, because there is other business we are considering because of the October 1 date hitting us, we will likely attempt to go into morning business from 2:15 until we finish the event with Senator Byrd this afternoon. But we will come back at 2:15 and deal with that.
I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
